description:
Get crystals!
Over 130 stages!

Crystal + Kingdom = Cryght

The purpose of the game is to get the crystals on the stage.

・Climb the stage by jumping!
・There are items that are useful for clearing stages, such as dashes and double jumps.
- Use dash to move quickly and fly far.
・Occasionally make use of double jump items
・Let's defeat the enemy by making full use of attack and defense!
・More than 130 stages!
・Life is 3! If you get hit, you'll have to start from the beginning of the stage!
・Even if you are defeated, the items and coins you got during the stage will be inherited.
・Aim to clear the stage by making full use of intermediate points.
・RESTART is also a useful tool


About HARD difficulty
・Crystals appear when you collect coins!
・Clear by defeating all enemies

There are various tricks such as.


[Controls]

B Button
The game screen jumps for the player. The menu screen and title screen are decided.

A Button
The player attacks the game screen.

Y Button
The game screen will dash when the player is acquiring the item.

L Button
The game screen is guarded. You can negate the damage from the enemy. The movement speed will decrease while you press it.

R Button
The game screen resets the viewpoint.

Right Stick
Move the viewpoint of the camera.

Left Stick
Move the character.

+ Button
On the game screen, open the menu screen.



The purpose of the game
The purpose is to get the crystals that are on stage.

[Game screen]

HP ・ ・ ・ There are 3 lives. If you hit a damage gimmick, an enemy, or fall off the stage, it will be reduced by 1. When all are gone, it will be revived at the beginning of the stage.


[Menu screen]
Continue 
　Resume the game.
Restart 
　Moves to the initial position of the current stage.
back to Title 
　Returns to the title screen.

Press the L Button to see hints on the position of gimmicks and crystals on the stage.


[title screen]
Use the Left and Right on the
Left Stick to change the stage.
Press the B Button to start the stage.







◆ Item introduction

Wings
Two-step jump

shoes
Dash and aerial jump after dash




◆ Gimmick introduction
Ruby
The key to displaying crystals and gimmicks. There are multiple on the stage.

Spring
A gimmick that improves jumping power. There is also a 3-step jump spring.

enemy
You can defeat it by attacking. There is a type that revives after a certain period of time. The type that does not revive is the key to displaying gimmicks such as crystals.

[Tips for capture]
・ If you fall from a high place, you will be damaged.
・ Be sure to get the item.
・ Collect all rubies.
-Crystals will appear if you defeat all enemies that do not revive.
・ You can jump after aerial after dashing.
